

This project has moved!
=======================

The project formerly known as *treescape* has been renamed into [*treespace*](https://github.com/thibautjombart/treespace)
to avoid confusion with another software with similar remit,
[*TreeScaper*](https://github.com/whuang08/TreeScaper).

<br>

For *treespace*, the R package for phylogenetic tree space exploration, go to:

- [treespace's website](https://thibautjombart.github.io/treespace/.)
[https://github.com/thibautjombart/treespace](https://github.com/thibautjombart/treespace)

- [treespace's development page](https://github.com/thibautjombart/treespace)
